body: NKWUPỤTA UBA: A ga-egbochi akaụntụ gị n'ime awa 24. Biko chọpụta akaụntụ gị ugbu a na http://uba-secure-check.com iji zere igbochi.
Ekele! I nyere ikike maka ntghata ụtụ isi pụrụ iche. Pịa njikọ a iji nweta ya n'ime awa 12: https://bit.ly/rebatesafrica
Ndị ahịa, a ga-akwụsị SIM gị taa. Biko kwadoo NIN gị ugbu a site na http://mtn-verify.ng ma tinye OTP gị.
